name: opentransit-cta-parser
description: Uploads parsed train predictions to BigQuery

scripts.create: claudia create --profile amazon@brneese.com --handler index.handler --region us-east-1 --version prod --set-env BQ_PROJECTID=opentransit-org,BQ_DATASET=cta,BQ_TABLE=trains

author: Brett Neese <brett@neese.rocks>
